Text: I think it's hilarious when I see a comment on a torrent about how amazing the quality is and then a comment immediately following saying how shitty the quality is. Why do uploaders get their dumbass friends to post ludicrous and false comments about their shitty uploading....hahahaha. Dumbasses. A/9 V/8. Decent to watch and burn for now, but you will eventually a more visibly, crisp copy.
